content: **size** one size **measurements** height 45cm / 18 **materials** daily stitch wool blend 1 skein of col 10 - yarn a 1 skein of col 09 - yarn b 1 skein of col 99 - yarn c **needles** circular needles 4 mm / us 6 **yarn quality** daily stitch wool blend hobbii 80% polyacryl 20 % wool 100 g / 3 5 oz = 168 m / 183 yds **gauge** 18 sts x 26 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in stockinette stitch **pattern information** this cuddly dog will be a best friend for any child with his floppy ears and sweet expression he is easy to love knitted flat and seamed this is a quick and easy project using
